translation.en: Dear Mr. Stevens:
translation.zh: 亲爱的史蒂文斯先生

translation.en: You will be surprised to hear from me after all this time.
translation.zh: 时隔多年你又听到我的消息 你一定很惊讶

translation.en: You've been in my thoughts since I heard Lord Darlington had died.
translation.zh: 自从听到达林顿勋爵去世的消息后 我一直挂念着你

translation.en: We read that his heirs put Darlington Hall up for sale...
translation.zh: 我听说 他的子嗣将达林顿庄园挂牌出售…

translation.en: ...as they no longer wished to maintain it.
translation.zh: 因为他们不想再维修庄园了

translation.en: As no one would buy such a large house...
translation.zh: 因为没有人 愿意买这么大规模的庄园…

translation.en: ...the new earl decided to demolish it and sell the stone for 5000 pounds.
translation.zh: 新的伯爵决定将它拆卸 石材将以五千英镑出售

translation.en: We also saw some rubbish in the Daily Mail which made my blood boil:
translation.zh: 我们还在《日报》上 读到了一些让我气愤的混账话

translation.en: "Traitor's nest to be pulled down."
translation.zh: “叛徒的窝要被大卸八块”

translation.en: One hundred and eighty guineas?
translation.zh: 一百八十基尼？

translation.en: One hundred and eighty? Have we done?
translation.zh: 一百八十？ 成交吗？

translation.en: Ladies and gentlemen, a great highlight of the sale:
translation.zh: 女士们先生们 本次拍卖的亮点
第414号地皮…

translation.en: ...the fine Elizabethan portrait, A Portly Gentleman.
translation.zh: 伊丽莎白时期的一幅精美画像 《富态的绅士》

translation.en: I'll start the bidding at 2000 guineas.
translation.zh: 起价两千基尼

translation.en: Two thousand guineas, thank you.
translation.zh: 两千基尼 谢谢

translation.en: Two-two.
translation.zh: 两千二

translation.en: Two-four.
translation.zh: 两千四

translation.en: Two-six.
translation.zh: 两千六

translation.en: Two-eight.
translation.zh: 两千八

translation.en: Three thousand, three-two, three-four, three-six.
translation.zh: 三千，三千二 三千四，三千六
三千八

translation.en: Four thousand guineas. Four and a half thousand.
translation.zh: 四千基尼 四千五百

translation.en: Five thousand.
translation.zh: 五千

translation.en: And a half.
translation.zh: 五千五

translation.en: Six thousand.
translation.zh: 六千

translation.en: And a half.
translation.zh: 六千五

translation.en: Seven thousand.
translation.zh: 七千

translation.en: And a half.
translation.zh: 七千五

translation.en: Eight thousand.
translation.zh: 八千

translation.en: And a half.
translation.zh: 八千五

translation.en: Nine thousand.
translation.zh: 九千

translation.en: And a half.
translation.zh: 九千五

translation.en: Ten thousand guineas is bid.
translation.zh: 十万基尼 第一次

translation.en: And a half.
translation.zh: 十万五

translation.en: Eleven thousand.
translation.zh: 十一万

translation.en: And a half.
translation.zh: 十一万五

translation.en: Against you, sir, at eleven and a half thousand guineas.
translation.zh: 与你竞价，先生 十一万五基尼

translation.en: All done at eleven and a half thousand guineas.
translation.zh: 十一万五成交

translation.en: I was very relieved to read how an American millionaire...
translation.zh: 我很高兴听到一个叫做路易斯的…

translation.en: ...named Lewis saved Darlington Hall...
translation.zh: 美国的百万富翁拯救了达林顿庄园…

translation.en: ...so you wouldn't be turned out of your home after all.
translation.zh: 这样你就不用离开你的家了

translation.en: Is it the same Congressman Lewis...
translation.zh: 是不是那个在1936年参加了…

translation.en: ...who attended His Lordship's conference in 1936?
translation.zh: 老伯爵组织的会谈的众议员路易斯呢？

translation.en: Mr. Stevens, I so often think of the good old days...
translation.zh: 史蒂文斯先生 我常常想起我在达林顿…

translation.en: ...when I was the housekeeper.
translation.zh: 做女管家时的美好的日子

translation.en: It was hard work...
translation.zh: 工作很辛苦…

translation.en: ...and I have known butlers easier to please than our Mr. Stevens...
translation.zh: 比您要宽松些的男管家我也见过…

translation.en: ...but those years with you were among the happiest of my life.
translation.zh: 但是与你共事那些年 依然是我人生中最开心的时光

translation.en: You must have a completely different staff now.
translation.zh: 您肯定已经换了一批手下

translation.en: Not many of the old faces around anymore.
translation.zh: 不再是我熟悉的那些人了

translation.en: There's not much need for the small army of footmen...
translation.zh: 对于达林顿勋爵来说…

translation.en: ...that Lord Darlington employed.
translation.zh: 不再需要那么一大群佣人

translation.en: My own news is not very cheerful.
translation.zh: 我的情况不是很乐观

translation.en: In the 7 years since I last wrote, I have again left my husband...
translation.zh: 自从我上次写信已经七年了 我感到很遗憾…

translation.en: ...and, sad to say, my marriage seems to be over.
translation.zh: 我再度离开了我的前夫 我的婚姻终于告终了

translation.en: I'm staying at a friend's boarding house in Clevedon.
translation.zh: 我现在暂住在克利文顿的 一个朋友的寄宿旅店

translation.en: I don't know what my future is.
translation.zh: 我不知道下一步怎么走

translation.en: Since Catherine, my daughter, got married, my life has been empty.
translation.zh: 自从我的女儿凯瑟琳结婚之后 我的生活就变得空虚无聊

translation.en: The years stretch before me and if only I knew how to fill them.
translation.zh: 我的前途渺茫 我不知道该如何面对

translation.en: But I would like to be useful again.
translation.zh: 我不希望变成一个废人

translation.en: -Burned again? -Yes, I'm sorry, sir.
translation.zh: -又烧焦了？ -是的，我很抱歉，先生

translation.en: The rule in the kitchen has always been...
translation.zh: 厨房里的规矩一向是…

translation.en: ...cook cooks the cooked breakfast while her assistant toasts the toast.
translation.zh: 厨师负责做饭 助手负责烤吐司面包

translation.en: Why don't we get her a pop-up toaster?
translation.zh: 为什么我们不买一个吐司机呢？

translation.en: We need not a new gadget but a revised staff plan, sir.
translation.zh: 我们不需要一个新机器 但是需要更新一份佣工计划

translation.en: A staff plan, huh? I didn't know we had one.
translation.zh: 佣工计划？ 我不知道我们有这个

translation.en: A faulty one, unfortunately.
translation.zh: 旧的计划不管用 我很抱歉

translation.en: Sir, quite recently...
translation.zh: 先生 最近…

translation.en: ...you were kind enough to suggest that I go on a little holiday trip...
translation.zh: 您很善解人意 建议我度个短假…

translation.en: ...around the country.
translation.zh: 到全国走一走

translation.en: Absolutely. Certainly, take a break. See the world.
translation.zh: 当然，你应该休息一下 去看看外面的世界

translation.en: Thank you, sir.
translation.zh: 谢谢您 先生

translation.en: When did you last see the world?
translation.zh: 你上一次出门看这个世界 是什么时候？

translation.en: The world always used to come to this house, if I may say so.
translation.zh: 请允许我这样说以前 世界总是向我走来

translation.en: You may say so.
translation.zh: 你有资格这样说

translation.en: Take off when I'm in London next week.
translation.zh: 你可以在我下个星期 去伦敦的时候出发

translation.en: I tell you what, you take the car.
translation.zh: 这样吧 你可以开车

translation.en: -Take the Daimler. -Good Lord, sir, I couldn't.
translation.zh: -就开那辆戴姆勒 -老天，先生，我不能

translation.en: You and that Daimler belong together.
translation.zh: 你和那辆戴姆勒天生一对

translation.en: You were made for each other.
translation.zh: 它是为你而生的

translation.en: That's most kind of you, I must say, sir. Most kind.
translation.zh: 您真是太善解人意了 我不得不说，您真是太好了

translation.en: I'd meant to travel the West, where I understand we have splendid scenery.
translation.zh: 我想去西边旅行 我知道那里有壮丽的风景

translation.en: And I might incidentally be able to solve our problems while I'm there.
translation.zh: 我很有可能在那里 把我们的困难解决

translation.en: A former housekeeper, at present living in Clevedon, has indicated...
translation.zh: 以前在这里的一位女管家 现在住在克利文顿…

translation.en: ...that she might be prepared to return to service.
translation.zh: 她说她想要回来继续工作

translation.en: What's this, your girlfriend?
translation.zh: 她是谁，你的女朋友吗？

translation.en: Or a former attachment?
translation.zh: 还是从前的旧情？

translation.en: Oh, no, sir.
translation.zh: 哦，不 先生

translation.en: No, but a very able housekeeper.
translation.zh: 都不是 只是一个非常能干的女管家

translation.en: A most able housekeeper.
translation.zh: 最能干的管家

translation.en: I was just kidding, Stevens.
translation.zh: 我刚刚在开玩笑 史蒂文斯

translation.en: Sorry.
translation.zh: 对不起

translation.en: You know what I like best about your papers?
translation.zh: 你知道我最喜欢 你们报纸上的哪个版块吗？

translation.en: These obituaries.
translation.zh: 讣闻

translation.en: Every son of a gun gets this stately funeral oration.
translation.zh: 不管是什么混人 都会得到一个体面的葬礼

translation.en: -It's not an art we have in the States. -Indeed, sir.
translation.zh: -我们美国可不是这个习俗 -说的是，先生

translation.en: Thank you, Stevens.
translation.zh: 谢谢，史蒂文斯

translation.en: Mr. Lewis.
translation.zh: 路易斯先生

translation.en: Dear Mrs. Benn...
translation.zh: 亲爱的本太太…

translation.en: ...I propose to reach Clevedon on October 3rd around 4 p.m.
translation.zh: 我计划于十月三号下午四点钟 抵达克利文顿

translation.en: I'd be grateful for a line from you...
translation.zh: 如果你能在汉格福特附近的 考令伯恩…

translation.en: ...to reach me at the post office at Collingbourne, near Hungerford...
translation.zh: 的邮局与我联系，我会感谢不尽…

translation.en: ...where I'm planning to stop.
translation.zh: 我准备在那里停脚

translation.en: Mrs. Benn, I always said you possess an amazing memory.
translation.zh: 本太太 我总是说你的记忆力惊人

translation.en: Our new employer is indeed Congressman Lewis...
translation.zh: 我们的新雇主确实是众议员路易斯…

translation.en: ...though he's now retired from political life in the U.S.
translation.zh: 虽然他如今已经退出了美国政治生涯

translation.en: He's taken up residence at Darlington Hall, soon to be joined by his family.
translation.zh: 他现在已经入住了达林顿庄园 很快就会与家人团聚

translation.en: But I regret to say we are woefully understaffed for a house this size.
translation.zh: 我不得不说 我们这么大的庄园很缺人手

translation.en: Mrs. Benn, will you permit me once again to sing your praises?
translation.zh: 本太太 你会允许我再度对你大力推荐吗？

translation.en: Let me state that when you left to get married...
translation.zh: 我要说明 自从你结婚离去后…

translation.en: ...no housekeeper ever reached your high standard in any department.
translation.zh: 别的管家从未能在任何方面达到你的水准

translation.en: I well remember your arrival at Darlington Hall.
translation.zh: 我还记得你刚来达林顿庄园的情景

translation.en: You came somewhat unexpectedly, one might even say impulsively...
translation.zh: 你出人意料地出现 甚至有点儿冲动地…

translation.en: ...while we were dead in the middle of the Charlgrove meet.
translation.zh: 当时我们在查尔格罗夫猎会期间忙碌着

translation.en: That day is marked in my memory in another way as well.
translation.zh: 我之所以对那天记忆犹新 还有另外一个原因

translation.en: It was the last time His Lordship...
translation.zh: 那天是勋爵他最后一次…

translation.en: ...was happy to welcome his neighbors, as in the old days.
translation.zh: 像往日一样热情的欢迎他的邻居朋友

translation.en: Of course, it had been years since any of them had coaxed him to hunt.
translation.zh: 当然了，他上一次被说服去打猎 已是很多年前的事了

translation.en: It was never a sport His Lordship enjoyed or approved of.
translation.zh: 对狩猎，勋爵从来就不喜欢 也不赞成

translation.en: -Good morning, Ayres. -My lord, nice to see you.
translation.zh: -早上好，阿亚斯 -勋爵，很高兴见到您

translation.en: Excuse me, sir.
translation.zh: 打扰了，先生

translation.en: I fear I may have been a little unwelcoming, even a little short.
translation.zh: 我恐怕已开始不怎么热情 甚至有点不耐烦

translation.en: You presented the best references I've ever seen.
translation.zh: 你出示的推荐信是我见过的最好的

translation.en: Which proved to be well-deserved.
translation.zh: 你得到的好评的确是应得的

translation.en: Though, I confess, I did have my doubts, on account of your youth.
translation.zh: 我不得不承认 你年纪轻轻，确实让我有顾虑

translation.en: No gentlemen callers allowed, of course.
translation.zh: 不允许有男士探访

translation.en: Forgive my mentioning it, but we've had those problems before.
translation.zh: 请原谅我说话太直接 我们曾有过这类的麻烦

translation.en: Inside the house too.
translation.zh: 连在庄园内的男工也不行

translation.en: The previous housekeeper ran off with the under-butler.
translation.zh: 之前的女管家和副管家私奔了

translation.en: If two staff members decide to get married, one can say nothing.
translation.zh: 如果两个雇员决定结婚 旁人不会有什么可说

translation.en: What I find a major irritation...
translation.zh: 但最让我心烦的…

translation.en: ...are those persons who go from post to post looking for romance.
translation.zh: 是那些常换工作、四处找浪漫的人

translation.en: Housekeepers are particularly guilty here.
translation.zh: 女管家特别要谨慎

translation.en: -No offense intended, of course. -None taken.
translation.zh: -不是针对你，请见谅 -没关系

translation.en: I know how a house is at sixes and sevens once the staff start marrying.
translation.zh: 我知道一旦仆人们开始私底下结婚 这个家就会乱了章法

translation.en: Yes, indeed.
translation.zh: 是的 很正确

translation.en: -Might I have a word, sir? -Of course.
translation.zh: -我能说句话吗，先生？ -当然

translation.en: My lord, it's regarding the under-butler...
translation.zh: 勋爵 这是有关上个月私奔的…

translation.en: ...and the housekeeper who ran off last month.
translation.zh: 女管家和副管家

translation.en: Bad business. How are you managing?
translation.zh: 真是糟糕 你要怎么处理？

translation.en: I've found two first-rate replacements.
translation.zh: 我找到了两个顶好的人来替代他们

translation.en: Miss Kenton, a young woman with excellent references.
translation.zh: 基顿小姐 履历非常优秀的年轻女士

translation.en: Very pleasing demeanor. Appears to be very able.
translation.zh: 非常端庄 很有办事能力

translation.en: And a man with considerable experience.
translation.zh: 还有一位男士，经验丰富

translation.en: -Older and happy to be under-butler. -Name?
translation.zh: -他年岁大些，也乐意当副管家 -叫什么？

translation.en: Stevens, sir.
translation.zh: 史蒂文斯，先生

translation.en: -Stevens? -Yes, sir.
translation.zh: -史蒂文斯？ -是的，先生

translation.en: -That's your name. -He's my father, sir.
translation.zh: -那是你的名字 -他是我的父亲，先生

translation.en: Really?
translation.zh: 真的吗？

translation.en: Couldn't do better. I'd like to see him sometime.
translation.zh: 再好不过了 我想要见见他

translation.en: He's outside the door.
translation.zh: 他就在门外等候

translation.en: Good. Bring him in.
translation.zh: 很好，带他进来

translation.en: Thank you, my lord.
translation.zh: 谢谢您，勋爵大人

translation.en: Father.
translation.zh: 父亲

translation.en: Mr. Stevens, how do you do?
translation.zh: 史蒂文斯先生，您好吗？

translation.en: -My lord. -Very good man here, your son.
translation.zh: -勋爵大人 -您的儿子很优秀

translation.en: He serves the house well. I don't know what we'd do without him.
translation.zh: 他把家管理的井井有条 我不知道没有他我们该怎么办

translation.en: -Proud of him? -Very, my lord.
translation.zh: -您为他骄傲吗？ -当然，勋爵大人

translation.en: Quite right too.
translation.zh: 非常正直

translation.en: Yes.
translation.zh: 是的

translation.en: Glad to have you with us.
translation.zh: 很高兴您能来

translation.en: Thank you, my lord.
translation.zh: 谢谢您，勋爵大人

translation.en: -Oh, Stevens.... -Sir?
translation.zh: -哦，史蒂文斯… -什么事，先生？

translation.en: What are we at dinner tonight? Fourteen? Sixteen?
translation.zh: 今晚晚宴有多少人？ 十四？还是十六？

translation.en: -Twelve, sir. -Right.
translation.zh: -十二个人，先生 -对

translation.en: Thank you, my lord.
translation.zh: 谢谢您，勋爵大人

translation.en: -Oh, Mr. Stevens. -Yes?
translation.zh: -哦，史蒂文斯先生 -什么事？

translation.en: -This pitcher seems out of place here. -Dining room. Well spotted.
translation.zh: -这只水壶好像放错了地方 -应该在正餐厅，观察力不错

translation.en: -Hello, William, how are you? -Good day, Miss Kenton.
translation.zh: -你好，威廉姆，你好吗？ -你好，基顿小姐

translation.en: -Hello. -Mr. Stevens.
translation.zh: -你好 -史蒂文斯先生

translation.en: I thought these might brighten your parlor.
translation.zh: 我想这些可能点亮您的休息室

translation.en: Beg your pardon?
translation.zh: 您说什么？

translation.en: They might cheer things up for you.
translation.zh: 它们会让您心情愉快

translation.en: That's very kind of you.
translation.zh: 非常感谢

translation.en: If you like, I could bring in some more for you.
translation.zh: 如果你喜欢 我还可以多摘点儿给你

translation.en: Thank you...
translation.zh: 谢谢你…

translation.en: ...but I regard this room as my private place of work...
translation.zh: 但是我把这房间看作私人工作室…

translation.en: ...and I prefer to keep distractions to a minimum.
translation.zh: 我不想要被打扰

translation.en: Would you call flowers a distraction, then?
translation.zh: 你认为花打扰了你？

translation.en: I appreciate your kindness. I prefer to keep things as they are.
translation.zh: 我很感激你的费心 我希望维持原样

translation.en: But since you are here, there is a small matter I wanted to mention.
translation.zh: 既然你在这儿 我想提一件小事

translation.en: I happened to be walking past the kitchen yesterday morning...
translation.zh: 我昨天碰巧经过厨房…

translation.en: ...and I heard you call to someone named William.
translation.zh: 我听到你叫一个叫威廉姆的人

translation.en: May I ask who you were addressing by that name?
translation.zh: 我能问一下那个人是谁吗？

translation.en: I should think I was addressing your father.
translation.zh: 我想我是在叫你的父亲

translation.en: There are no other Williams in this house.
translation.zh: 这个家里没有第二个叫威廉姆斯的人

translation.en: True.
translation.zh: 是的

translation.en: May I ask you in future to address my father as Mr. Stevens?
translation.zh: 能否请你以后称呼他为 史蒂文斯先生？

translation.en: If speaking of him to a third party, you may call him...
translation.zh: 如果以第三人称称呼他 你可以叫他…

translation.en: ...Mr. Stevens Sr. to distinguish him from myself.
translation.zh: 史蒂文斯先生一世 以区别于我

translation.en: So I would be most grateful to you, Miss Kenton.
translation.zh: 那样的话我会非常感谢 基顿小姐

translation.en: I don't quite understand what you're getting at.
translation.zh: 我不太明白你的意思

translation.en: I am the housekeeper in this house, and your father is the under-butler.
translation.zh: 我是这个家的女管家 你的父亲是副管家

translation.en: I am accustomed to addressing under- servants by their Christian names.
translation.zh: 我习惯了对手下的佣人直呼其名

translation.en: If you would stop to think for a moment...
translation.zh: 如果你能静下来好好想一想…

translation.en: ...you'd realize how inappropriate it is...
translation.zh: 你就会发现，以你的身份 叫我的父亲…

translation.en: ...for one such as yourself to address as William...
translation.zh: 威廉姆…

translation.en: ...someone such as my father.
translation.zh: 是多么不合适

translation.en: It must have been very galling for your father to be called William...
translation.zh: 被我这样的人直呼其名… 对你父亲来说肯定很难堪

translation.en: ...by one such as myself.
translation.zh: 对你父亲来说肯定很难堪

translation.en: My father is a person from whom...
translation.zh: 如果你愿意花时间多观察…

translation.en: ...if you'd observe him more, you may learn things.
translation.zh: 你会从他身上学到很多东西

translation.en: I'm grateful for your advice, but do tell me...
translation.zh: 我很感激你的建议 但是请告诉我…

translation.en: ...what things might I learn from him?
translation.zh: 我能从他身上学到什么？

translation.en: I might point out that you're...
translation.zh: 我应该指出…

translation.en: ...often unsure of what goes where and which item is which.
translation.zh: 你时常不清楚东西该放在哪儿

translation.en: I'm sure Mr. Stevens Sr. is very good at his job...
translation.zh: 我想史蒂文斯一世先生 一定很擅长他的工作…

translation.en: ...but I can assure you that I'm very good at mine.
translation.zh: 但是我要告诉你 我也很擅长我负责的事情

translation.en: -Of course. -Thank you.
translation.zh: -那是当然 -谢谢你

translation.en: If you will please excuse me.
translation.zh: 请允许我离开

translation.en: Miss Kenton....
translation.zh: 基顿小姐…

translation.en: Oh, well.
translation.zh: 哦，好吧

translation.en: My compliments to cook.
translation.zh: 我要称赞一下厨师

translation.en: What a lovely piece of crackling.
translation.zh: 真是一道美味佳肴

translation.en: I'm sure you said something witty. Share it with the rest of us.
translation.zh: 你肯定说了一句俏皮话 请和我们大家分享吧

translation.en: I said the sprouts is done the way I like them. Crisp-like, not mushy.
translation.zh: 我是说这道芽甘蓝的做法 很合我意，很脆，一点儿也不烂

translation.en: Sprouts "are" done, not "is" done.
translation.zh: 应该用复数，不是单数

translation.en: Isn't that right, George?
translation.zh: 不是吗，乔治？

translation.en: Yes, Mr. Stevens.
translation.zh: 是的，史蒂文斯先生

translation.en: Forgive the correction, as I would have done...
translation.zh: 请原谅我的指正 我在你那个年龄… 以你的教育水平 我也会犯同样的错误

translation.en: ...at your age for the sake of my education.
translation.zh: 以你的教育水平 我也会犯同样的错误

translation.en: I'm sure even you have ambitions to rise in your profession.
translation.zh: 我肯定就连你 也在你这一行有点雄心

translation.en: Oh, yes. I want to be a butler, to be called Mister...
translation.zh: 哦，是的 我要当管家，被称为先生…

translation.en: ...sit in my own pantry by my own fire, smoking my cigar.
translation.zh: 坐在我自己的休息室 坐在火炉旁，吸着雪茄

translation.en: I wonder if you realize what it takes to be a great butler?
translation.zh: 我想知道您对当管家了解多少？

translation.en: Takes dignity, that's what it takes.
translation.zh: 需要自尊自重 这是最关键的

translation.en: Thank you, Mr. Stevens. Dignity, that's right. Dignity.
translation.zh: 谢谢您，史蒂文斯先生 说得对，自尊自重

translation.en: The definition from our quarterly The Gentlemen's Gentleman:
translation.zh: 引用《绅士们的绅士》 季度刊物上的话

translation.en: A great butler must be possessed of dignity--
translation.zh: 一位优秀的管家一定要自尊自重

translation.en: In keeping with his position.
translation.zh: 与他的身份相匹配

translation.en: There was this English butler in India.
translation.zh: 在印度有一位英国管家

translation.en: One day, he goes in the dining room and what's under the table?
translation.zh: 有一天，他走进正餐厅 猜猜桌子底下有什么？

translation.en: A tiger.
translation.zh: 一只老虎

translation.en: Not turning a hair, he goes to the drawing room.
translation.zh: 他一点儿也不惊慌 转身走进了绘画室

translation.en: "Excuse me, my lord," and whispering, so as not to upset the ladies:
translation.zh: “打扰了，主人”他小声说道 以便不会惊吓到旁边的女士

translation.en: "I'm sorry. There appears to be a tiger in the dining room.
translation.zh: “我很抱歉 但是餐桌下面有一只老虎

translation.en: Perhaps His Lordship will permit use of the twelve-bores?"
translation.zh: 或许您会准许我使用猎枪？”

translation.en: They go on drinking their tea. And then, there's three gunshots.
translation.zh: 他们继续喝着茶 然后听到了三声枪响

translation.en: They don't think nothing of it. In India, they're used to anything.
translation.zh: 他们毫不惊慌 在印度什么事情都可能发生

translation.en: When the butler is back to refresh the teapots...
translation.zh: 当管家回来 重新给茶续水时…

translation.en: ...he says, cool as a cucumber:
translation.zh: 他冷静地说

translation.en: "Dinner will be served at the usual time, my lord.
translation.zh: “晚餐时间不变，我的主人

translation.en: And I am pleased to say there will be no discernible traces left...
translation.zh: 我向您保证在晚餐之前

translation.en: ...of the recent occurrence by that time."
translation.zh: 刚刚的意外留下痕迹就会丝毫不存”

translation.en: I'll repeat it. "There will be no discernible traces left...
translation.zh: 我来重复一遍 “在晚餐之前…

translation.en: ...of the recent occurrence by that time."
translation.zh: 刚刚的意外留下痕迹就会丝毫不存”

translation.en: -Wonderful, Mr. Stevens. -Thank you, Mr. Stevens.
translation.zh: -太精彩了，史蒂文斯先生 -谢谢您，史蒂文斯先生

translation.en: Wonderful story. That's the ideal that we should all aim for. Dignity.
translation.zh: 精彩的故事 那是我们都要追求的目标，自尊自重

translation.en: For you, Mr. Stevens.
translation.zh: 是叫您的，史蒂文斯先生

translation.en: Thank you.
translation.zh: 谢谢你

translation.en: It's for Mr. Stevens Sr., Mr. Stevens.
translation.zh: 我说的是史蒂文斯先生一世 史蒂文斯先生

translation.en: Thank you, Miss Kenton.
translation.zh: 谢谢您，基顿小姐

translation.en: Mary.
translation.zh: 玛丽

translation.en: Put Mr. Stevens Sr.'s plate with cook to keep it warm.
translation.zh: 把史蒂文斯先生一世的盘子给厨子 给它保温

translation.en: Yes, Miss Kenton.
translation.zh: 是的，基顿小姐

translation.en: Thank you.
translation.zh: 谢谢你

translation.en: Not at all, Mr. Stevens.
translation.zh: 不客气，史蒂文斯先生

translation.en: If you're searching for your dustpan, it is out on the landing.
translation.zh: 如果你在找你的畚箕 它在外面的阳台上

translation.en: My dustpan?
translation.zh: 我的畚箕？

translation.en: Your dustpan. You've left it on the landing.
translation.zh: 你的畚箕 你把它落在了外面的阳台上

translation.en: -I haven't used a dustpan. -Really? It must be somebody else.
translation.zh: -我从来没有用过畚箕 -是吗？那肯定是别人的

translation.en: -I don't follow you. -My mistake, no doubt. One of many.
translation.zh: -我不明白你的意思 -是我的错，毫无疑问，我经常犯错

translation.en: Morning, sir.
translation.zh: 早上好，先生

translation.en: I've invited Giscard Dupont D'Ivry as the French delegate.
translation.zh: 我邀请了迪士嘉·都旁·都威利 作为法国代表

translation.en: He'll never come!
translation.zh: 他不会来的！

translation.en: I just had word of his acceptance.
translation.zh: 我刚得到消息说他答应了

translation.en: Dupont is fanatically anti-German. His speech in Geneva in '33...
translation.zh: 都旁是激进的德国反对者 他1933年在日内瓦发表的讲话…

translation.en: ...made me ashamed to be an ally of the French.
translation.zh: 让我羞于做一名法国的支持者

translation.en: It's not the English way.
translation.zh: 这不是英国人的做派

translation.en: No, it is not.
translation.zh: 不，根本不是

translation.en: This is the purpose of our conference, to discuss these matters informally...
translation.zh: 这就是我们的会议的目的 非正式地讨论这些事情…

translation.en: ...far from the to-do of an international conference...
translation.zh: 在一种友好的 放松的氛围中…

translation.en: ...in the friendly and relaxed...
translation.zh: 就好像在家里面一样…

translation.en: ...atmosphere of one's home.
translation.zh: 而不是那种正式的国际会谈

translation.en: We may bring round the French to our point of view.
translation.zh: 我们或许能让法国人回心转意

translation.en: And that of the Germans.
translation.zh: 还有德国人的

translation.en: I'm sorry to interrupt, but how can we associate with the Germans?
translation.zh: 我很抱歉地打断你 但我们怎么能跟德国人同一战线呢？

translation.en: With the Nazi Party! They have torn up and trampled every treaty...
translation.zh: 那些纳粹团伙！ 他们撕毁并践踏了每一项条约…

translation.en: ...and are a growing threat to Europe, not to mention a brutal dictatorship.
translation.zh: 日渐成为欧洲的劲敌 更不要说他们残酷的独裁统治

translation.en: My dear boy, when I was in Berlin, I saw at last a happy German people...
translation.zh: 我的好朋友，我在柏林的时候 至少我看见了幸福的德国民众…

translation.en: ...with jobs, bread, pride in their country and love of their leader.
translation.zh: 他们有工作和面包 为自己的国家骄傲，热爱他们的领袖

translation.en: And what about the Jews?
translation.zh: 那些犹太人呢？

translation.en: Did His Lordship wish to exchange the Chinaman in the cabinet room...
translation.zh: 史蒂文斯先生，是勋爵先生的意愿 把内阁室里的瓷器…

translation.en: ...with the one outside the door?
translation.zh: 换成门外的那些？

translation.en: -Chinaman? -Yes.
translation.zh: -瓷器？ -是的

translation.en: The Chinaman from the cabinet room is outside this door. See for yourself.
translation.zh: 内阁室里的瓷器就在门外 过来自己看看吧

translation.en: I'm busy at the moment.
translation.zh: 我现在很忙

translation.en: Just pop your head outside this door and see for yourself.
translation.zh: 你只需要把头探出去 看一看

translation.en: -I'll look into the matter in due course. -You think it's a fantasy?
translation.zh: -我会认真负责这件事的 -你认为我是在胡闹吗？

translation.en: A fantasy on my part due to my inexperience?
translation.zh: 就因为我缺乏经验？

translation.en: I'm busy in this room, Miss Kenton.
translation.zh: 我现在很忙，基顿小姐

translation.en: I shall wait.
translation.zh: 我可以等

translation.en: Outside.
translation.zh: 在外面

translation.en: Look!
translation.zh: 看呀！

translation.en: -Is that not the wrong Chinaman? -I am very busy.
translation.zh: -那不是勋爵不想要的瓷器吗？ -我真的很忙

translation.en: Have you nothing better to do than stand around?
translation.zh: 你没有其他的事情去做吗？

translation.en: Look at it and tell me the truth.
translation.zh: 你看它一眼，告诉我真相

translation.en: Keep your voice down. What would the other servants think...
translation.zh: 请小声点儿 别的佣人听见我们…

translation.en: ...of us shouting about a Chinaman?
translation.zh: 大声讨论瓷器会怎么想？

translation.en: And I would ask you...
translation.zh: 我请您，史蒂文斯先生…

translation.en: ...to turn around and look at the Chinaman.
translation.zh: 转过身去，亲眼看一看

translation.en: It is a small mistake.
translation.zh: 这是个小错误

translation.en: Your father is entrusted with more than he can cope with.
translation.zh: 你的父亲不能胜任他的职务

translation.en: Let me pass.
translation.zh: 我要过去

translation.en: Your father left the dustpan on the floor.
translation.zh: 你的父亲把畚箕落在了阳台上

translation.en: He left polish on the cutlery and confused the Chinaman.
translation.zh: 他把増亮剂留在了餐具上 还分不清瓷器

translation.en: Recognize this before he commits a major error!
translation.zh: 你最好在他犯下大错之前 赶快承认吧！

translation.en: -You can't talk to me like this. -I'm afraid I must.
translation.zh: -你不能这样跟我说话 -我恐怕不得不说

translation.en: I'm giving you serious advice.
translation.zh: 我在给你严肃的建议

translation.en: Your father should be relieved of a number of his duties for his own good.
translation.zh: 为了你父亲着想 应该缩小他的职责范围

translation.en: Whatever he once was, he no longer has the same ability or strength.
translation.zh: 不管他曾经多么的尽职尽责 他现在已经力不从心了

translation.en: I thank you for your advice.
translation.zh: 我很感谢你的建议

translation.en: Perhaps now I can go about my business.
translation.zh: 或许现在我可以去忙我的了

translation.en: I never meant to keep you from your business.
translation.zh: 我从来不愿打扰你的工作

translation.en: Thank you.
translation.zh: 谢谢你

translation.en: It's vital that we've agreed a common policy before the arrival of...
translation.zh: 我们一定要先达成统一战线 在那位代表来之前…

translation.en: -...your Frenchman. What's his name? -Giscard Dupont D'Ivry.
translation.zh: -你那位法国代表叫什么？ -迪士嘉·都旁·都威利

translation.en: We also expect the American delegate...
translation.zh: 我们也在期待美国的代表…

translation.en: ...Congressman Lewis, to arrive on the same day.
translation.zh: 众议员路易斯也会在当天到场

translation.en: Who is he, this American?
translation.zh: 这个美国人 他是谁？

translation.en: He's an unknown quantity. A young congressman from Pennsylvania.
translation.zh: 他是匹黑马 来自美国宾夕法尼亚的年轻众议员

translation.en: Sits on some sort of powerful Foreign Affairs Committee.
translation.zh: 是一个重要的外交委员会的一员

translation.en: Heir to one of those American fortunes.
translation.zh: 继承了一大笔遗产

translation.en: -Meatpacking? -Trolley cars?
translation.zh: -肉食包装？ -还是有轨火车？

translation.en: Or dry goods?
translation.zh: 要么就是干货生意？

translation.en: What are dry goods?
translation.zh: 干货到底是什么？

translation.en: Something that Americans make a lot of money in.
translation.zh: 显然美国人能靠它发财

translation.en: No, I think Mr. Lewis' fortune comes from cosmetics, actually.
translation.zh: 不，我想路易斯的遗产 来自于化妆品

translation.en: It's old Mr. Stevens!
translation.zh: 那是老史蒂文斯先生！

translation.en: Get a cushion, quickly. A blanket!
translation.zh: 快拿一个垫子来 快，一条毯子！

translation.en: The silver! The silver!
translation.zh: 银具！银具！

translation.en: Oh, my lord. Sorry.
translation.zh: 哦，我的勋爵 我很抱歉

translation.en: You'll be all right.
translation.zh: 你会没事儿的

translation.en: Thank you, sir. I'm sorry. What happened?
translation.zh: 谢谢你，先生，我很抱歉 发生了什么？

translation.en: -He tripped with the tray. -I saw it from the window.
translation.zh: -他端着盘子摔倒了 -我隔着窗户看见了

translation.en: This has never happened before.
translation.zh: 这种事从来没有发生过

translation.en: -May I telephone the doctor? -Yes, do.
translation.zh: -要我给医生打电话吗？ -是的，去吧

translation.en: -I'm sorry. -Don't worry.
translation.zh: -我很抱歉 -别这么说

translation.en: I'm sorry.
translation.zh: 我很抱歉

translation.en: Oh, Stevens.
translation.zh: 哦，史蒂文斯

translation.en: Your father feeling better?
translation.zh: 你的父亲好点儿了吗？

translation.en: He's made a full recovery.
translation.zh: 他完全恢复了

translation.en: Good.
translation.zh: 很好

translation.en: We don't wish to see anything of that sort ever happen again, do we?
translation.zh: 我们不想这样的事再次发生 明白吗？

translation.en: -I mean, your father collapsing. -Indeed not, my lord.
translation.zh: -我是说，你的父亲情况欠佳 -当然明白，勋爵

translation.en: And it could happen anywhere.
translation.zh: 他任何地点都可能会摔倒

translation.en: At any time.
translation.zh: 任何时间

translation.en: The first of the foreign delegates will be here in less than a fortnight.
translation.zh: 外国代表团的第一批人 会在两周内到达

translation.en: -We are well prepared, my lord. -I'm sure you are.
translation.zh: -我们都准备好了 -我相信你

translation.en: What happens within this house could have...
translation.zh: 这座庄园里发生的事很有可能…

translation.en: ...considerable repercussions on the course that Europe takes.
translation.zh: 对欧洲局势产生深远影响

translation.en: It means a great deal.
translation.zh: 这件事非同小可

translation.en: And it means a great deal to me personally.
translation.zh: 对于我个人同样意义非凡

translation.en: I had a German friend, Karl-Heinz Bremann.
translation.zh: 我有一个德国朋友 卡尔·赫兹·布莱曼

translation.en: We fought on opposite sides in the war.
translation.zh: 我们在这场战争中持对立观点

translation.en: We always said when it was over, we'd sit down and have a drink...
translation.zh: 我们常说 等战事结束以后，我们要坐下来… 像绅士一样好好喝一杯

translation.en: ...like gentlemen.
translation.zh: 像绅士一样好好喝一杯

translation.en: The Versailles Treaty made a liar of me.
translation.zh: 《凡尔赛条约》让我成了一个骗子

translation.en: Yes, a liar, Stevens.
translation.zh: 是的，一个骗子 史蒂文斯

translation.en: Because the terms we imposed were so harsh that Germany was finished.
translation.zh: 因为我们这些胜利者强加的条约 对于德国人来说太过苛刻了

translation.en: One doesn't do that to a defeated foe.
translation.zh: 我们不应该那样对待战败者

translation.en: Once your man's on the canvas, it ought to be over.
translation.zh: 一旦一个人出现在了画像上 一切就应该结束了

translation.en: My friend Bremann was ruined by inflation.
translation.zh: 我的朋友布莱曼 因为通货膨胀而处境艰难

translation.en: Couldn't get a job in postwar Germany.
translation.zh: 在战后的德国找不到工作

translation.en: Killed himself.
translation.zh: 自杀了

translation.en: Shot himself in a railway carriage between Hamburg and Berlin.
translation.zh: 在汉堡到柏林之间的一个车厢里 饮弹自尽了

translation.en: Since then, I've felt it my duty to help Germany and to give her...
translation.zh: 自从那件事之后 我觉得我应该帮助德国…

translation.en: ...a fair chance.
translation.zh: 给他们一个公平的机会

translation.en: So this conference is crucial...
translation.zh: 所以这次会议至关重要…

translation.en: ...and we can't run the risk of any accidents.
translation.zh: 我们必须确保万无一失

translation.en: There's no question of your father leaving.
translation.zh: 绝不是说你的父亲得离开

translation.en: You're simply being asked to reconsider his duties.
translation.zh: 你只要重新考虑他的职责

translation.en: Of course, my lord. I understand fully.
translation.zh: 我当然理解 勋爵大人

translation.en: Good.
translation.zh: 很好

translation.en: I'll leave you to think about it, then, Stevens.
translation.zh: 我会给你时间思考的 史蒂文斯

translation.en: Thank you, sir.
translation.zh: 谢谢您 先生

translation.en: -You. -Sir?
translation.zh: -你 -先生？

translation.en: I'm short-handed in the dining room. I can use you in the servery.
translation.zh: 正餐厅缺人手了 你可以去帮忙

translation.en: -Thank you, Mr. Stevens, sir. -Smarten up. Look sharp.
translation.zh: -谢谢您，史蒂文斯先生 -机灵点儿，活分点儿

translation.en: Good morning.
translation.zh: 早上好

translation.en: Good morning.
translation.zh: 早上好

translation.en: I might've known you'd be up and ready for the day.
translation.zh: 我应该知道你肯定已经起床了

translation.en: I've been up for two hours.
translation.zh: 我已经起来两个小时了

translation.en: -That's not much sleep. -It's all the sleep I need.
translation.zh: -你的睡眠时间不够 -我只需睡这么多

translation.en: I've come to talk to you.
translation.zh: 我想要跟你谈谈

translation.en: Talk, then. I haven't got all morning.
translation.zh: 谈吧 我可没有太多时间

translation.en: -I'll come straight to the point. -Do, and be done with it.
translation.zh: -我就直奔主题吧 -说吧，长话短说

translation.en: Some of us have work to be getting on with.
translation.zh: 我们有些人还要去干活呢

translation.en: There's to be a very important conference in this house next week.
translation.zh: 下周这个时候 这里将要召开非常重要的会议

translation.en: People of great stature will be His Lordship's guests.
translation.zh: 很多有头有脸的人物将会成为座上宾

translation.en: We must all put our best foot forward.
translation.zh: 我们必须全力以赴

translation.en: Because of Father's recent accident...
translation.zh: 因为您最近的那一次意外…

translation.en: ...it has been suggested that you no longer wait at table.
translation.zh: 勋爵建议 您不能再在餐厅服侍

translation.en: I've waited at table every day...
translation.zh: 我每天在餐厅服侍…

translation.en: ...for the last 54 years.
translation.zh: 至今已有54年了

translation.en: It has also been decided that you should no longer carry heavy trays.
translation.zh: 他也建议 您不要再托举重物

translation.en: Now, here's a revised list of your duties.
translation.zh: 您的职责范围有了调整

translation.en: Look, I fell...
translation.zh: 听着，我摔倒…

translation.en: ...because of those paving stones.
translation.zh: 是因为那些铺路石

translation.en: They're crooked.
translation.zh: 它们凹凸不平

translation.en: Why don't you get them put right before someone else falls?
translation.zh: 你为什么不在别人摔倒之前 把它们填平呢？

translation.en: You will read the revised list of your duties.
translation.zh: 你来读一下你的最新职责范围吧

translation.en: Get those stones put right.
translation.zh: 去把那些石头填平

translation.en: You don't want those "gentlemen of stature" breaking their necks.
translation.zh: 你可不想那些“有头有脸的人物” 把脖子摔断了

translation.en: No, indeed, I don't.
translation.zh: 当然不

translation.en: Mr. Stevens?
translation.zh: 史蒂文斯先生？

translation.en: What is it?
translation.zh: 什么事？

translation.en: You have what we can call a roving commission.
translation.zh: 你的职责是巡回委员会

translation.en: In other words, you can exercise your own judgment...
translation.zh: 换句话说 你要凭自己的判断…

translation.en: ...within certain limits, of course.
translation.zh: 当然是在一定的范围内

translation.en: Now, here are the mops, and.... Here.
translation.zh: 这些是拖把… 在这儿

translation.en: -Are these me mops? -Right. Your brushes.
translation.zh: -这些是我的拖把？ -是的，还有刷子

translation.en: And me brushes?
translation.zh: 还有我的刷子？

translation.en: -And me mops. -That's right.
translation.zh: -还有拖把 -是的

translation.en: What do you want me to do with them?
translation.zh: 你要我拿这些干什么？

translation.en: I think you know what to do with them, Father. Look for dust and dirt.
translation.zh: 我想你知道拿它们干什么 父亲，清理灰尘

translation.en: If I find any dust or dirt...
translation.zh: 如果我发现了灰尘…

translation.en: ...I go over them with this mop.
translation.zh: 我会用拖把把它们清理掉

translation.en: That's right.
translation.zh: 说得对

translation.en: Now, I suggest you start off...
translation.zh: 现在我建议你…

translation.en: ...with the brasses on the doors.
translation.zh: 从门把手开始

translation.en: There's that door there. Then the door that's open.
translation.zh: 先是那扇门 接着是那扇开着的门

translation.en: And then there's this door here....
translation.zh: 还有这边的门…

translation.en: Here's your polish. And duster.
translation.zh: 这是增亮剂 还有鸡毛掸

translation.en: History could well be made under this roof over the next few days.
translation.zh: 历史将会在接下来的几天 在这里开启新的篇章

translation.en: Each and every one of you...
translation.zh: 你们当中的所有人…

translation.en: ...can be proud of the role you will play on this occasion.
translation.zh: 将会为你们 在这场活动当中的角色而感到光荣

translation.en: Imagine yourself the head of a battalion...
translation.zh: 想象你们是一个营地的头目…

translation.en: ...even if it is only filling the hot-water bottles.
translation.zh: 即使你的职责只是倒热水

translation.en: Each one has his own particular duty...
translation.zh: 每个人都有特定的职责…

translation.en: ...or her particular duty, as the cap fits.
translation.zh: 根据自己的特长

translation.en: Polished brass, brilliant silver, mahogany shining like a mirror.
translation.zh: 门把手锃亮，银具发光 桃花心木明亮得像镜子

translation.en: That is the welcome we will show these foreign visitors...
translation.zh: 我们要向来宾展现诚挚的欢迎…

translation.en: ...to let them know they are in England...
translation.zh: 让他们知道在英国…

translation.en: ...where order and tradition still prevail.
translation.zh: 规矩和传统依然在发扬光大

translation.en: Thank you, Brian.
translation.zh: 谢谢你，布莱恩

translation.en: My lord?
translation.zh: 勋爵大人？

translation.en: Mr. Lewis, the American, has arrived.
translation.zh: 路易斯先生，那个美国人 已经到了

translation.en: He was expected tomorrow. What have you done with him?
translation.zh: 他应该明天到的 你怎么迎接他的？

translation.en: Mr. Lewis has been shown upstairs.
translation.zh: 我已经带他到了楼下

translation.en: Oh, Stevens?
translation.zh: 哦，史蒂文斯？

translation.en: My godson, Cardinal, will shortly become engaged to be married.
translation.zh: 我的教子，卡迪那 很快就要订婚

translation.en: Indeed, sir. I offer my congratulations.
translation.zh: 是的，先生 我要恭喜您

translation.en: Thank you, Stevens.
translation.zh: 谢谢你 史蒂文斯

translation.en: I feel very responsible for the boy.
translation.zh: 我很惦记那个孩子

translation.en: He is my godson, and his father was my closest friend, as you know.
translation.zh: 他不仅是我的教子，如你所知 他的父亲还曾是我的挚友

translation.en: And now that he's gone, well...
translation.zh: 现在他去世了…

translation.en: ...I feel in place of a father to him.
translation.zh: 我觉得自己就是他的父亲

translation.en: I've appointed him as my secretary at the conference.
translation.zh: 我任命他作为我在会议上的秘书

translation.en: He's been jolly thorough in helping me to prepare.
translation.zh: 他很乐意帮忙

translation.en: I realize this is a somewhat irregular thing to ask you to do.
translation.zh: 我意识到这样的要求对你来说 有点儿违反常规

translation.en: I'd be glad to be of any assistance.
translation.zh: 我愿意效劳

translation.en: I'm sorry to bring this up...
translation.zh: 我不得不说…

translation.en: ...but I just can't see how on earth to make it go away.
translation.zh: 因为我是在困扰

translation.en: You are familiar with the facts of life?
translation.zh: 你很了解生活 是吗？

translation.en: -My lord? -The facts of life.
translation.zh: -勋爵您的意思？ -我是说生活

translation.en: Birds, bees. You are familiar, aren't you?
translation.zh: 鸟，蜜蜂 这些你都熟悉，对吗？

translation.en: I'm afraid I don't quite follow you.
translation.zh: 我恐怕不是很明白您的意思

translation.en: Let me put my cards on the table.
translation.zh: 让我直说吧

translation.en: I'm so busy with this conference. Of course, you are too...
translation.zh: 我忙于这场会议 当然你也很忙…

translation.en: ...but someone has to tell him.
translation.zh: 但是必须有人跟他讲

translation.en: In a way, it would be easier for you.
translation.zh: 由你来说，会更简单

translation.en: Less awkward.
translation.zh: 没有那么尴尬

translation.en: I'd find the task rather daunting, I'm afraid.
translation.zh: 我觉得这项任务很艰巨

translation.en: I might not get to it before Reginald's wedding day.
translation.zh: 恐怕雷金纳德婚礼前 我都不会有机会说出口

translation.en: Of course, this goes far beyond the call of duty.
translation.zh: 当然了 这远超出你分内的事

translation.en: I shall do my best.
translation.zh: 我会尽力而为的

translation.en: I'd be grateful if you'd try. It'd be a lot off my mind.
translation.zh: 我很感激你愿意一试 这样帮了我的大忙

translation.en: There's no need to make a song and dance of it. Just convey the facts.
translation.zh: 没有必要画蛇添足 直奔主题就行

translation.en: God! Stevens!
translation.zh: 老天！ 史蒂文斯！

translation.en: Sorry. Most sorry, sir...
translation.zh: 对不起 我很抱歉，先生…

translation.en: ...but I do have something to convey to you rather urgently.
translation.zh: 但是我有要紧的事要告诉您

translation.en: If I may, I'll come to the point.
translation.zh: 如果您允许 请准许我直奔主题

translation.en: Perhaps you noticed this morning the ducks and the geese by the pond?
translation.zh: 或许今天早上 您看到了池塘边的鸭子和鹅？

translation.en: Ducks and geese? I don't think so.
translation.zh: 鸭子和鹅？ 好像没有

translation.en: Well, perhaps the birds and the flowers, then...
translation.zh: 或者是鸟和花 还有…

translation.en: ...or the shrubs, the bees....
translation.zh: 或者灌木 蜜蜂…

translation.en: I've not seen any bees.
translation.zh: 我没有看见蜜蜂

translation.en: -It's not the best time to see them. -What, the bees?
translation.zh: -现在不是看到蜜蜂的季节 -什么，蜜蜂吗？

translation.en: What I'm saying is that, with the arrival of spring...
translation.zh: 我要说的是 当春天来临的时候…

translation.en: ...we shall see a most remarkable and profound change...
translation.zh: 我们会看到周遭的环境… 发生了翻天覆地的变化

translation.en: ...in the surroundings.
translation.zh: 发生了翻天覆地的变化

translation.en: I'm sure that's right. I'm sure the grounds are not at their best now.
translation.zh: 有道理 我想现在不是最好的季节

translation.en: I wasn't paying attention to the glories of nature...
translation.zh: 我没有留意自然的美丽…

translation.en: ...because it's worrying....
translation.zh: 因为我头绪万千

translation.en: Dupont D'Ivry has arrived in a foul mood, the last thing anyone wants.
translation.zh: 都旁·都威利一来就心情欠佳 没有人希望如此

translation.en: -M. Dupont D'Ivry has arrived? -Half an hour ago, in a foul mood.
translation.zh: -都旁·都威利先生到了？ -半个小时前，心情欠佳

translation.en: In that case, excuse me. I'd better go and attend to him.
translation.zh: 如果是那样的话 请允许我退下，去迎接他

translation.en: Right you are. Kind of you to talk to me.
translation.zh: 很好 谢谢你跟我聊天

translation.en: Not at all. I've one or two words more to convey on the topic of...
translation.zh: 不客气 我还有一些话没说…

translation.en: ...as you put it most admirably...
translation.zh: 如您所说…

translation.en: ...the glories of nature.
translation.zh: 自然的美丽

translation.en: But it must wait for another occasion.
translation.zh: 但不得不等下一次了

translation.en: I'll look forward to it. But I'm more of a fish man.
translation.zh: 我很期待 但是我更喜欢钓鱼

translation.en: -Fish? -I know all about fish.
translation.zh: -钓鱼？ -我很擅长钓鱼

translation.en: Freshwater and salt.
translation.zh: 淡水和咸水

translation.en: All living creatures would be relevant to our discussion.
translation.zh: 我们的谈话涉及所有生灵

translation.en: Excuse me. I had no idea that Monsieur Dupont D'Ivry had arrived.
translation.zh: 请允许我退下 我不知道都旁先生已经到了

translation.en: Thank you.
translation.zh: 谢谢您

translation.en: May I be of assistance, sir?
translation.zh: 我来服侍您吧，先生？

translation.en: Oh, the butler.
translation.zh: 哦，管家

translation.en: I have sore feet, so I need a basin with warm water and salts, please.
translation.zh: 我的脚很酸 我需要装满热水和盐的泡脚盆

translation.en: I'll arrange that with the housekeeper, sir.
translation.zh: 我会和女管家交代的，先生

translation.en: Warm water and salts as soon as possible.
translation.zh: 尽快端来温水和盐

translation.en: How do you do? But I speak English.
translation.zh: 你好吗？ 我会说英语

translation.en: Good. That's lucky for me. I'm Jack Lewis, the U.S. delegate.
translation.zh: 太好了，算我走运 我是杰克·路易斯，美国代表

translation.en: Could we speak privately soon?
translation.zh: 我们可以尽快单独说话吗？

translation.en: Yes, of course.
translation.zh: 当然

translation.en: But I have blisters due to some sightseeing they made me do in London.
translation.zh: 但是因为他们带我参观伦敦 我的脚生了水泡

translation.en: I had already seen the Tower of London.
translation.zh: 我已经看过了伦敦塔

translation.en: I've discovered that things are not moving...
translation.zh: 我发现这里的事情并没有向…

translation.en: ...in a direction that I think you would approve of.
translation.zh: 您会赞同的那个方向发展

translation.en: German rearmament is a fact to be accepted.
translation.zh: 德国的武装重建是不争的事实

translation.en: It's in our own interest to have a free and equal Germany.
translation.zh: 重建一个自由强大的德国 对我们都有好处

translation.en: Not a prostrate nation...
translation.zh: 而不是瘫痪弱国…

translation.en: ...upon whom an unfair peace treaty was imposed 16 years ago.
translation.zh: 被16年前一套不平等的和约压制

translation.en: Those who've been in Germany...
translation.zh: 你们当中去过德国的人…

translation.en: ...can only thrill, as I have, to the signs of rebirth.
translation.zh: 肯定会和我一样 惊讶于他们的浴火重生

translation.en: --to assist Germany in her virile struggle for economic recovery...
translation.zh: 帮助德国 在她努力复苏经济的道路上…

translation.en: ...including support for her fair demand for equality of armaments...
translation.zh: 包括支持她对于军备平等的要求…

translation.en: ...and universal military service for German youth.
translation.zh: 还有全国年轻人服兵役的规定

translation.en: If we, in postwar Europe....
translation.zh: 如果我们 在战后的欧洲…

translation.en: I need more water. I need another basin to bathe my feet.
translation.zh: 我需要水 我还需要一个泡脚的盆

translation.en: Follow me, sir.
translation.zh: 请跟我来，先生

translation.en: Excuse me.
translation.zh: 不好意思

translation.en: -We have to talk. -This way, sir.
translation.zh: -我们必需谈谈 -这边请，先生

translation.en: My friend, I am in agony. Too tight shoes. I blame myself.
translation.zh: 我的朋友，我太难受了 我的鞋太紧，怪我自己

translation.en: Vanity.
translation.zh: 虚荣

translation.en: We must do some fast maneuvering to restrain the Germans.
translation.zh: 我们必须迅速采取措施 遏制德国人

translation.en: Please come this way, gentlemen.
translation.zh: 请这边来，先生

translation.en: Butler, please, could you help me with my feet-- Shoe?
translation.zh: 管家，麻烦你了 你能不能帮我脱鞋？

translation.en: -Yes, of course. -Take it off.
translation.zh: -是的，当然 -把它们脱掉

translation.en: What they said about equality of arms for Germany, military service--
translation.zh: 他们提到的军备平等 全民服兵役…

translation.en: -Sorry, sir. -I'll manage.
translation.zh: -对不起，先生 -我来吧

translation.en: What?
translation.zh: 怎么了？

translation.en: Your father's been taken ill, sir.
translation.zh: 您的父亲生病了，先生

translation.en: -Where? -Outside the Chinese bedroom, sir.
translation.zh: -在哪儿？ -在中式卧室外，先生

translation.en: Germany wants peace as much as we do. She needs peace.
translation.zh: 德国人和我们一样渴望和平 她需要和平

translation.en: Here, let me help you with that.
translation.zh: 来，让我帮你吧

translation.en: Thank you.
translation.zh: 谢谢你

translation.en: Thank you, Charles.
translation.zh: 谢谢你，查尔斯

translation.en: Take a basin of hot water and salts...
translation.zh: 请帮我拿一盆热水和盐…

translation.en: ...to Mr. D'Ivry in the billiards room. Is that understood?
translation.zh: 放到都威利的房间，明白吗？

translation.en: -Yes, Mr. Stevens. -Good. Do it.
translation.zh: -是的，史蒂文斯先生 -很好，去吧

translation.en: Father?
translation.zh: 父亲？

translation.en: Father?
translation.zh: 父亲？

translation.en: -Mr. Stevens. -Yes?
translation.zh: -史蒂文斯先生 -什么事？

translation.en: I have more time than you to look after him. I've called the doctor.
translation.zh: 我比你更有时间照顾他 我已经叫了医生

translation.en: Thank you, Miss Kenton.
translation.zh: 谢谢你，基顿小姐

translation.en: Thank you.
translation.zh: 谢谢你

translation.en: -Doctor. -Yes, hello, Stevens.
translation.zh: -医生 -是的，你好，史蒂文斯

translation.en: Your father's not so good, I'm afraid.
translation.zh: 你的父亲情况不妙 我很遗憾

translation.en: If he deteriorates, call me, will you?
translation.zh: 如果他继续恶化 给我打电话，好吗？

translation.en: How old is he, 70, 72?
translation.zh: 他有多大了 七十，还是七十二？

translation.en: -Seventy-five, sir. -I see.
translation.zh: -七十五，先生 -我明白了

translation.en: -If he deteriorates, let me know. -I will, sir. Thank you, doctor.
translation.zh: -如果他继续恶化，叫我 -我会的，先生，谢谢您，医生

translation.en: More haste, less speed.
translation.zh: 要麻利，但不要慌张

translation.en: There's something missing.
translation.zh: 有东西不见了

translation.en: What is it?
translation.zh: 什么东西？

translation.en: -The spoon from the cruet set, sir. -Good.
translation.zh: -调味组合的勺子 -很好

translation.en: Well observed.
translation.zh: 眼力很好

translation.en: Now, never touch the lip of the glass.
translation.zh: 永远不要碰杯子的边缘

translation.en: Good.
translation.zh: 很好

translation.en: Glass first, and then....
translation.zh: 先是杯子，然后是…

translation.en: Is everything in hand downstairs?
translation.zh: 楼下一切就绪吗？

translation.en: We're preparing the last dinner of the conference.
translation.zh: 我们在为会议的最后一顿晚餐做准备

translation.en: You can imagine the kitchen.
translation.zh: 你可以想象一下厨房里的景象

translation.en: -But is everything in hand? -Yes, I think we're up to scratch.
translation.zh: -是不是都有条不紊？ -是的，我想我们准备得很好

translation.en: Are you feeling any better?
translation.zh: 你感觉好点儿了吗？

translation.en: There's something I have to tell you.
translation.zh: 我要告诉你一件事

translation.en: I have so much to do. Why don't we talk in the morning?
translation.zh: 我有很多事要做 要不要明天早上再说？

translation.en: Jim...
translation.zh: 吉姆…

translation.en: ...I fell out of love with your mother.
translation.zh: 我不再爱你的母亲了

translation.en: I loved her once.
translation.zh: 我曾经爱过她

translation.en: The love went out of me when I found her carrying on.
translation.zh: 当我发现她有外遇后 我的爱消失了

translation.en: A good son.
translation.zh: 你是一个好儿子

translation.en: Proud of you.
translation.zh: 我为你骄傲

translation.en: I hope I've been a good father.
translation.zh: 我希望我是一个好父亲

translation.en: I tried me best.
translation.zh: 我尽力了

translation.en: You better get down there...
translation.zh: 你最好下去吧…

translation.en: ...or heaven only knows what they'll be up to.
translation.zh: 要不然他们肯定不知所措

translation.en: Go on.
translation.zh: 走吧

translation.en: Go on!
translation.zh: 走吧！

translation.en: We'll talk in the morning.
translation.zh: 我们明天早上再谈

translation.en: On the last day of our conference...
translation.zh: 在会议的最后一天…

translation.en: ...permit me to say how impressed I have been...
translation.zh: 请允许我表达我的惊喜之情…

translation.en: ...with the spirit of goodwill that has prevailed.
translation.zh: 这次会议留下了很多感动

translation.en: Goodwill for Germany.
translation.zh: 对德国的祝愿

translation.en: And with tears in my eyes...
translation.zh: 我满含泪水…

translation.en: ...I see that everyone here has recognized...
translation.zh: 看到这里的所有人…

translation.en: ...our right to be, once again, a strong nation.
translation.zh: 承认了我们的权力 希望再次崛起

translation.en: With my hand on my heart, I declare...
translation.zh: 我衷心地表示…

translation.en: ...that Germany needs peace...
translation.zh: 德国需要和平…

translation.en: ...and desires only peace.
translation.zh: 只希望和平

translation.en: Peace with England...
translation.zh: 和英国的和平…

translation.en: ...and peace with France.
translation.zh: 和法国的和平

translation.en: Thank you very much.
translation.zh: 谢谢您

translation.en: I, too, have been impressed...
translation.zh: 我，同样感到惊喜…

translation.en: ...yes, deeply impressed...
translation.zh: 深受惊喜…

translation.en: ...by the genuine desire for peace manifested at this conference.
translation.zh: 这次会议体现的 对和平的诚挚愿望

translation.en: Unlike our American colleague...
translation.zh: 不像我们的美国同胞…

translation.en: ...we in Europe know the horrors of war.
translation.zh: 我们欧洲人知道战争的可怕

translation.en: And whether we are French or English or Italian or German...
translation.zh: 不管我们是法国人，英国人 还是意大利人，或者德国人…

translation.en: ...our one desire is to never have to experience them again.
translation.zh: 我们的唯一愿望就是不再有战争

translation.en: Indeed.
translation.zh: 说的是

translation.en: Impressed, or I may say touched...
translation.zh: 印象深刻 或者说感动于…

translation.en: ...by the words of goodwill and friendship I have heard...
translation.zh: 我在这里听到的祝愿和友谊…

translation.en: ...I promise you that I shall do my utmost...
translation.zh: 我保证我会竭尽所能…

translation.en: ...to change my country's policy...
translation.zh: 使我们国家针对曾经与我们为敌…

translation.en: ...towards that nation which was once our foe...
translation.zh: 使我们国家针对曾经与我们为敌… 但是现在，我敢说…

translation.en: ...but is now, I may venture to say...
translation.zh: 已成为我们的朋友的国家…

translation.en: ...our friend.
translation.zh: 改用新的政治策略

translation.en: Ladies and gentlemen...
translation.zh: 女士们先生们…

translation.en: ...the United States doesn't want war any more than you do.
translation.zh: 美国与你们一样，不愿意有战争

translation.en: On the other hand, neither do we want peace at any price...
translation.zh: 但是我们不能 不惜任何代价换取和平…

translation.en: ...because some prices, you may find...
translation.zh: 因为你们以后会发现 有些代价…

translation.en: ...are too outrageously high to pay.
translation.zh: 高得太离谱，不值得

translation.en: But let's not get into that now. We may have to soon enough.
translation.zh: 但是我们现在先不提这个 可能是迟早的事

translation.en: For the moment, let us raise our glasses to Lord Darlington...
translation.zh: 现在，让我们举杯 感谢达林顿勋爵…

translation.en: ...in gratitude for his magnificent hospitality.
translation.zh: 对我们的热情接待

translation.en: -Lord Darlington. -Lord Darlington.
translation.zh: -达林顿勋爵 -达林顿勋爵

translation.en: Lord Darlington....
translation.zh: 达林顿勋爵…

translation.en: Lord Darlington is a classic English gentleman of the old school.
translation.zh: 达林顿勋爵是一位传统的英国绅士

translation.en: Decent and honorable and well-meaning.
translation.zh: 体面、尊贵，而且善良

translation.en: So are all of you.
translation.zh: 各位都是

translation.en: All decent, honorable and well-meaning gentlemen.
translation.zh: 都是体面、尊贵、善良的绅士

translation.en: It's a pleasure and a privilege to visit with you here.
translation.zh: 能够和你们共席，是我的殊荣

translation.en: But...
translation.zh: 但是…

translation.en: ...now, excuse me, I must say this...
translation.zh: 请原谅，我不得不说…

translation.en: ...you are, all of you, amateurs.
translation.zh: 你们所有人都是业余的

translation.en: And international affairs should never be run by gentlemen amateurs.
translation.zh: 国际事宜 不应该由一帮业余的绅士来决定

translation.en: Do you have any idea of what sort of a place the world is becoming?
translation.zh: 你们知不知道 这个世界会成为什么样子？

translation.en: The days when you could act out of noble instincts are over.
translation.zh: 你们靠绅士的高尚精神而行的时代 已经结束了

translation.en: Europe has become the arena of Realpolitik, the politics of reality.
translation.zh: 欧洲已经成为了真实政治的竞技场 现实的政治

translation.en: If you like real politics.
translation.zh: 如果你们喜欢现实的政治

translation.en: What you need is not gentlemen politicians, but real ones.
translation.zh: 你们需要的不是绅士政治 而是现实

translation.en: You need professionals, or you're headed for disaster.
translation.zh: 你们需要专业的政客 否则你们就会一团糟

translation.en: So I propose a toast, gentlemen...
translation.zh: 我建议我们举杯 先生们…

translation.en: ...to the professionals.
translation.zh: 为了专业人士

translation.en: -Mr. Stevens. -What?
translation.zh: -史蒂文斯先生？ -怎么了？

translation.en: Well, I've no wish to enter into a quarrel...
translation.zh: 我不想在最后的一晚…

translation.en: ...on our last evening together.
translation.zh: 卷入任何争执

translation.en: But let me say this. What you describe as amateurism...
translation.zh: 但是请允许我这样说 这些你所谓的业余…

translation.en: ...is what I think most of us here still prefer to call honor.
translation.zh: 仍被我们多数人叫做信誉

translation.en: Miss Kenton would like to see you concerning your father.
translation.zh: 基顿小姐想要见您 是关于您父亲的事

translation.en: I suggest that your professionalism means greed and power...
translation.zh: 我认为您所主张的专业人士 只不过是一些贪婪和嗜权的人…

translation.en: ...rather than to see justice and goodness prevail in the world.
translation.zh: 他们并不想看到这个世界 变得公义和美好

translation.en: I've never concealed from myself that what we were asking of Germany...
translation.zh: 我从来没有掩饰过 我们要求德国所做的…

translation.en: ...is a complete break from the tradition of this country. Thank you.
translation.zh: 是跟这个国家的传统彻底脱离 谢谢您

translation.en: -Miss Kenton. -Yes.
translation.zh: -基顿小姐 -是的

translation.en: Mr. Stevens, I'm very sorry.
translation.zh: 史蒂文斯先生，我很抱歉

translation.en: Your father passed away four minutes ago.
translation.zh: 你的父亲在四分钟前过世了

translation.en: Oh, I see.
translation.zh: 哦，我知道了

translation.en: I'm so very sorry.
translation.zh: 我很抱歉

translation.en: I wish there was something I could say.
translation.zh: 我希望我能安慰你

translation.en: Will you come up and see him?
translation.zh: 你要上去看看他吗？

translation.en: Well, I'm very busy at the moment. In a little while, perhaps.
translation.zh: 我现在很忙 待会儿吧

translation.en: In that case, will you permit me to close his eyes?
translation.zh: 如果这样的话 你能允许我把他的眼睛合上吗？

translation.en: I would be most grateful. Thank you.
translation.zh: 谢谢你 非常感谢

translation.en: My father would wish me to carry on. I can't let him down.
translation.zh: 我的父亲一定希望我继续工作 我不能让他失望

translation.en: No. Of course.
translation.zh: 不，当然了

translation.en: I'd really like to continue our little chat sometime.
translation.zh: 我很期待继续我们之间的对话

translation.en: About nature.
translation.zh: 关于大自然

translation.en: You're right. I should come back when everything's burgeoning.
translation.zh: 你说得对 我应该在万物复苏的时候回来

translation.en: Yes, sir. Indeed.
translation.zh: 是的，先生

translation.en: As I said before, my main interest has always been in fish.
translation.zh: 正如我所说 我最大的兴趣是钓鱼

translation.en: When I was small, I kept tropical fish in a tank.
translation.zh: 我小的时候 常常在鱼缸里养热带鱼

translation.en: I harbored quite a passion for them.
translation.zh: 我非常喜欢它们

translation.en: I'll have another drop of that, if you don't mind.
translation.zh: 你不介意我再喝一杯吧

translation.en: You all right?
translation.zh: 你还好吗？

translation.en: I'm perfectly all right.
translation.zh: 我非常好

translation.en: Not feeling unwell?
translation.zh: 感觉不舒服吗？

translation.en: No, sir. A little tired, perhaps.
translation.zh: 不，先生 只是有一点儿累

translation.en: Wonderful!
translation.zh: 太精彩了

translation.en: What a beautiful example of German culture you've brought to this house.
translation.zh: 你代表了德国的优秀文化

translation.en: Very nice.
translation.zh: 非常好

translation.en: I hope there's no hard feelings.
translation.zh: 我希望您不会对我耿耿于怀

translation.en: Oh, my dear good chap.
translation.zh: 哦，当然不会

translation.en: I like a good, clean fight. Giving as good as one gets, what?
translation.zh: 我喜欢公平正大的争斗 据理力争，不是吗？

translation.en: I have the greatest respect for the English. I love it here.
translation.zh: 我对英国人充满了崇敬 我很喜欢这里

translation.en: My family brought us here as kids, so I feel at home.
translation.zh: 我们小时候曾与父母来过 我感觉像是第二个故乡

translation.en: Anyway, thank you.
translation.zh: 多谢

translation.en: Excuse me.
translation.zh: 对不起

translation.en: You all right?
translation.zh: 你还好吗？

translation.en: Yes, perfect, my lord.
translation.zh: 很好，勋爵大人

translation.en: You coming down with a cold or something?
translation.zh: 你感冒了吗？

translation.en: It's been a long day.
translation.zh: 今天有点儿累

translation.en: It's been a hard day for both of us.
translation.zh: 对我们来说都很累

translation.en: -Well done. -Thank you sir.
translation.zh: -干得漂亮 -谢谢您

translation.en: -Darlington. -Trimmer.
translation.zh: -达林顿 -崔莫

translation.en: -Miss Kenton. -Mr. Stevens.
translation.zh: -基顿小姐 -史蒂文斯先生

translation.en: My condolences.
translation.zh: 请节哀顺变

translation.en: It was a stroke. A severe stroke. He wouldn't have suffered much pain.
translation.zh: 他死于很严重的中风 没有多少痛苦

translation.en: Thank you for telling me.
translation.zh: 谢谢你

translation.en: There's a distinguished foreign gentleman in the billiard room...
translation.zh: 有一位外国贵宾在台球室…

translation.en: ...in need of attention.
translation.zh: 需要您的诊治

translation.en: Urgent?
translation.zh: 很紧急吗？

translation.en: His feet.
translation.zh: 他的脚

translation.en: Feet?
translation.zh: 脚？

translation.en: Yes.
translation.zh: 是的

translation.en: -I'll take you to him. -If it's urgent.
translation.zh: -我带你去见他 -如果要紧的话

translation.en: It is urgent. The gentleman is in pain.
translation.zh: 很要紧，他很痛苦

translation.en: Mr. Stevens.
translation.zh: 史蒂文斯先生

translation.en: My condolences.
translation.zh: 我很抱歉

translation.en: Thank you. That is most kind of you.
translation.zh: 谢谢你 我很感激你的帮助

translation.en: -Miss Kenton. -Thank you.
translation.zh: -基顿小姐 -谢谢你

translation.en: Good afternoon.
translation.zh: 下午好

translation.en: My name is Stevens. I'm hoping there's a letter for me.
translation.zh: 我叫史蒂文斯 我想你这儿有我的一封信

translation.en: -I'll just check for you, sir. -James Stevens.
translation.zh: -我看看 -詹姆斯·史蒂文斯

translation.en: -I'd like two apples, please. -There you are, Mr. Stevens.
translation.zh: -我想要两个苹果 -给您，史蒂文斯先生

translation.en: -You are touring in these parts? -I'm on my way to Clevedon.
translation.zh: -您在这里观光吗？ -我要去克利文顿

translation.en: -How much is that? -That'll be threepence, please.
translation.zh: -多少钱？ -三便士，谢谢

translation.en: And you'd be coming from...?
translation.zh: 您从哪里来？

translation.en: -Oxfordshire. -Whereabouts?
translation.zh: -牛津郡 -具体哪里？

translation.en: -Sorry? -Whereabouts in Oxfordshire?
translation.zh: -什么？ -牛津郡的哪里？

translation.en: Darlington.
translation.zh: 达林顿

translation.en: That rings a bell. Wasn't there a Lord Darlington? Some sort...
translation.zh: 听来耳熟 不是有一个达林顿勋爵，有位…

translation.en: ...of Nazi, got us in the war?
translation.zh: 亲近纳粹 使我们卷入了战争？

translation.en: I'm the butler there, and my employer...
translation.zh: 我是那里的管家，我的主人…

translation.en: ...is Mr. Lewis, an American gentleman.
translation.zh: 路易斯先生是一位美国绅士

translation.en: I didn't know the former owner.
translation.zh: 我不认识前任房主

translation.en: Your change.
translation.zh: 找您的钱

translation.en: I should be glad to meet you at the Sea View Hotel, opposite the pier.
translation.zh: 我会很高兴在海景酒店与您见面 就在码头对面

translation.en: We'll have such a lot to talk about, and I'll have many questions.
translation.zh: 我们有好多要聊的 我有很多问题

translation.en: Except for you, I've lost touch with all our friends at Darlington Hall.
translation.zh: 除了你，我和达林顿的老朋友们 都失去了联系

translation.en: But that's no wonder.
translation.zh: 但是一点儿也不奇怪

translation.en: It was long ago and a lot has happened in between.
translation.zh: 那是很多年前的事了 这期间发生了很多事

translation.en: Who could keep track of all the people His Lordship once employed?
translation.zh: 谁能跟勋爵曾雇佣的所有人 一直保持联络呢？

translation.en: My lord, you rang?
translation.zh: 勋爵大人，您叫我？

translation.en: -Have the young German ladies arrived? -They're outside.
translation.zh: -那两位德国年轻女士到了吗？ -她们已经在外面了

translation.en: I'd like to say hello to them, practice my German.
translation.zh: 我想和她们打个招呼 练习一下我的德文

translation.en: -They do speak excellent English. -Good. Well, ask them to come in.
translation.zh: -她们的英语很流利 -好的，让她们进来吧

translation.en: This is Elsa and this is Irma.
translation.zh: 这位是艾尔莎 她是阿玛

translation.en: I'm asking about their journey.
translation.zh: 我在询问她们的旅程

translation.en: It was long, my lord.
translation.zh: 路途很长，大人

translation.en: I asked if they like the weather.
translation.zh: 我在问她们喜不喜欢这里的天气

translation.en: We are grateful to you, my lord, for letting us come here.
translation.zh: 我们非常感谢您，大人 感谢您让我们来

translation.en: Our parents are very grateful.
translation.zh: 我们的父母都很感激

translation.en: Not at all. Miss Kenton will look after you.
translation.zh: 不用客气 基顿小姐会照顾好你们的

translation.en: -Won't you? -Indeed, my lord.
translation.zh: -是吗？ -当然，大人

translation.en: Welcome to Darlington Hall.
translation.zh: 欢迎来到达林顿庄园

translation.en: -Thank you, my lord. -Thank you, my lord.
translation.zh: -谢谢您，勋爵大人 -谢谢您，勋爵大人

translation.en: -Will there be anything else? -No, no.
translation.zh: -还有什么事吗？ -没了

translation.en: Sir Geoffrey.
translation.zh: 杰弗里爵士

translation.en: Good to see you.
translation.zh: 很高兴见到你

translation.en: How do you do?
translation.zh: 您好吗？

translation.en: Well, come in.
translation.zh: 请进

translation.en: -Mr. Benn. -Mr. Stevens.
translation.zh: -本先生 -史蒂文斯先生

translation.en: Gentlemen, if you'd like to wait here for a while.
translation.zh: 先生们 你们可以在外面稍等片刻

translation.en: -Hi, Mr. Benn! -Miss Kenton.
translation.zh: -你好，本先生！ -基顿小姐

translation.en: -Aren't you still at Stanton Lacey? -I'm with Sir Geoffrey now.
translation.zh: -你不在斯坦顿·蕾西那里工作吗？ -我已经跟杰弗里爵士一段时间了

translation.en: -You haven't changed one bit. -I'll let you get on.
translation.zh: -你一点儿也没变 -我不打扰你了

translation.en: -Perhaps we'll meet later. -I hope so.
translation.zh: -或许我们还会再见 -希望如此

translation.en: But, gentlemen, you speak of Jews and Gypsies, Negroes and so forth.
translation.zh: 但是，先生们，你们一直谈 犹太人、吉普赛人、黑人等等

translation.en: But one has to regard the racial laws of the Fascists...
translation.zh: 但是依我所见 我们必须认识到法西斯的…

translation.en: ...as a sanitary measure, much overdue, in my opinion.
translation.zh: 种族政策是早就该 用来清理国家的措施

translation.en: Imagine trying to enforce such a rule in this country--
translation.zh: 想象一下 将这种规则在这个国家实行

translation.en: You cannot run a country without a penal system.
translation.zh: 一个国家不能没有惩处机构

translation.en: Here we call them prisons. There, they call them concentration camps.
translation.zh: 我们叫做监狱 他们叫做集中营

translation.en: Is there any meat of any kind in this soup?
translation.zh: 这个汤里有肉吗？

translation.en: I think it's mushroom stock, sir.
translation.zh: 应该是蘑菇汤 先生

translation.en: Mushroom ends and skins, onion and celery. No meat at all.
translation.zh: 蘑菇根和皮 洋葱，芹菜，没有肉

translation.en: Cold water, and then cook adds sherry.
translation.zh: 冷水 然后厨师加了雪莉酒

translation.en: I hear you have a Labor fellow from your constituency.
translation.zh: 我听说你的选区有一个劳工代表

translation.en: Over there, they've got rid of all that trade union rubbish.
translation.zh: 德国早就废除了工会这种废物制度

translation.en: Believe me, no workers strike in Germany.
translation.zh: 相信我 德国没有工人敢罢工

translation.en: And everyone's kept in line.
translation.zh: 所有人都遵守秩序

translation.en: No wonder this country is going down the drain.
translation.zh: 难怪我们的国家要走下坡路

translation.en: It is internally diseased.
translation.zh: 我们的内部患了病

translation.en: I think there may be butter in the croutons. Do you know?
translation.zh: 我想这些面包干上抹了黄油 是吗？

translation.en: I'm afraid there may be.
translation.zh: 恐怕是的

translation.en: You've made a cozy little nest here.
translation.zh: 你在这里看上去很舒服

translation.en: Seems to me you must be a well-contented man.
translation.zh: 在我看来 史蒂文斯先生，您也一定很满足吧

translation.en: In my philosophy, Mr. Benn...
translation.zh: 依我的哲学观，本先生…

translation.en: ...a man cannot call himself well-contented...
translation.zh: 一个人如果没有尽自己所能…

translation.en: ...until he has done all he can...
translation.zh: 对他的主人尽忠…

translation.en: ...to be of service to his employer.
translation.zh: 就不能算得上满足

translation.en: This assumes that one's employer...
translation.zh: 当然了，这个观点的基础是…

translation.en: ...is a superior person not only in rank or wealth...
translation.zh: 主人是一个优秀的人 不论是地位以及财富…

translation.en: ...but in moral stature.
translation.zh: 还是道德高尚的人

translation.en: And in your opinion, what's going on up there has "moral stature"?
translation.zh: 在你看来 现在这发生的事是“道德高尚”？

translation.en: I wish I could be sure.
translation.zh: 我希望我也那么肯定

translation.en: But I'm not.
translation.zh: 但是我没有

translation.en: I've heard some very fishy things. Very fishy.
translation.zh: 我听说一些可疑的事 非常可疑

translation.en: I hear nothing.
translation.zh: 我什么也没听说

translation.en: Listen.
translation.zh: 听着

translation.en: That's so touching, isn't it?
translation.zh: 那真令人感动，不是吗？

translation.en: To listen to the gentlemen would distract me from my work.
translation.zh: 旁听绅士间的对话会让我在工作时分神

translation.en: Miss Kenton.
translation.zh: 基顿小姐

translation.en: It's fresh soda.
translation.zh: 新鲜的苏打水

translation.en: Thank you, Mr. Benn.
translation.zh: 谢谢你，本先生

translation.en: Would you be joining us?
translation.zh: 你要加入我们吗？

translation.en: Thank you, but it's very late and I have an early start.
translation.zh: 谢谢你，但是现在很晚了 我明天还要早起

translation.en: Good night.
translation.zh: 晚安

translation.en: -Good night, Mr. Stevens. -Good night, Miss Kenton.
translation.zh: -晚安，史蒂文斯先生 -晚安，基顿小姐

translation.en: Good-looking woman.
translation.zh: 她很美

translation.en: Miss Kenton.
translation.zh: 基顿小姐

translation.en: It was never the same after she left Stanton Lacey.
translation.zh: 她离开斯坦顿·蕾西家后 那就再不如以往了

translation.en: I handed in my own notice six months later.
translation.zh: 我在六个月以后也递交了辞呈

translation.en: I'd be lost without her.
translation.zh: 没有她，我不知道怎么办

translation.en: A first-rate housekeeper is essential in a house like this...
translation.zh: 一个一等一的女管家对于一座…

translation.en: ...where great affairs are decided between these walls.
translation.zh: 决定世界局势的家来说 是至关重要

translation.en: -Good morning. -My lord.
translation.zh: -早上好 -勋爵大人

translation.en: My lord.
translation.zh: 勋爵大人

translation.en: "We do the Jews no injustice when we say that the revelation of Christ...
translation.zh: “当我们说基督的启示 犹太人是无法理解…

translation.en: ...is something incomprehensible and hateful to them.
translation.zh: 而且会痛恨，这并不是对他们不公

translation.en: Though he apparently sprang from their midst...
translation.zh: 虽然基督出身于他们中间…

translation.en: ...he embodies the negation of their whole nature.
translation.zh: 他代表了对犹太人本性的否定

translation.en: The Jews are far more sensitive about this than we are.
translation.zh: 犹太人对这件事比我们更敏感

translation.en: This demonstration of the cleft that separates us Europeans from the Jew...
translation.zh: 这种要把欧洲人和犹太人 分裂的演示…

translation.en: ...is not given in order to let religious prejudice...
translation.zh: 并不是为了要用宗教歧视…

translation.en: ...with its dangerous bias, settle the matter...
translation.zh: 以其有危险性的偏见，来解决争端

translation.en: ...but because the perception of two fundamentally different natures...
translation.zh: 而是因为认识到两种截然不同的文化…

translation.en: ...reveals a real gulf."
translation.zh: 揭露了一条深渊”

translation.en: Stevens.
translation.zh: 史蒂文斯

translation.en: We have some refugee girls on the staff now, I believe.
translation.zh: 我想我们现在的员工中包括几名难民女孩

translation.en: We do.
translation.zh: 是的

translation.en: Two housemaids, Elsa and Irma.
translation.zh: 两个女仆，艾尔莎和阿玛

translation.en: You'll have to let them go, I'm afraid.
translation.zh: 你必须让她们走

translation.en: Let them go, my lord?
translation.zh: 让她们离开，大人？

translation.en: It's regrettable, but we have no choice.
translation.zh: 我很遗憾，但是我别无选择

translation.en: You must see the whole thing in context.
translation.zh: 你必须看到现在的大局

translation.en: I have the well-being of my guests to consider.
translation.zh: 我必须考虑我的来宾

translation.en: My lord....
translation.zh: 勋爵大人…

translation.en: May I say...
translation.zh: 请允许我说…

translation.en: ...they work extremely well.
translation.zh: 她们干活儿很努力

translation.en: They're intelligent, polite and very clean.
translation.zh: 她们聪明、礼貌、干净

translation.en: I'm sorry, but I've looked into this matter very carefully.
translation.zh: 我很抱歉 但是我已经仔细思考过了

translation.en: There are larger issues at stake.
translation.zh: 现在的问题很严重

translation.en: I'm sorry, but there it is.
translation.zh: 我很抱歉 但是她们必须走

translation.en: They're Jews.
translation.zh: 她们是犹太人

translation.en: Yes, my lord.
translation.zh: 是的，大人

translation.en: I'm amazed you can stand there as if...
translation.zh: 我真不敢相信，你能站在这儿…

translation.en: ...you were discussing orders for the larder. I can't believe it!
translation.zh: 似乎是在谈订购食物的事 我真不敢相信！

translation.en: Elsa and Irma are to be dismissed because they're Jewish?
translation.zh: 艾尔莎和阿玛被赶走 就因为她们是犹太人？

translation.en: His Lordship has decided. There's nothing for you and I to discuss.
translation.zh: 勋爵大人已经决定好了 我们没什么好讨论的了

translation.en: Without work, they could be sent back to Germany.
translation.zh: 没有工作 她们会被遣返回德国的

translation.en: It is out of our hands.
translation.zh: 这不是我们能管的

translation.en: I tell you, if you dismiss my girls tomorrow, it will be wrong!
translation.zh: 我告诉你，如果你把我的姑娘们赶走 你就大错特错了

translation.en: A sin, as any sin ever was one!
translation.zh: 这是罪 罪大恶极！

translation.en: There are many things you and I don't understand in this world.
translation.zh: 这个世界上有很多事 你和我都不理解

translation.en: His Lordship understands fully and has studied the larger issues at stake...
translation.zh: 勋爵大人理解的很透彻 而且做了研究…

translation.en: ...concerning, say...
translation.zh: 他说是因为…

translation.en: ...the nature of Jewry.
translation.zh: 犹太人的本质

translation.en: Mr. Stevens....
translation.zh: 史蒂文斯先生…

translation.en: I warn you...
translation.zh: 我警告你…

translation.en: ...if those girls go...
translation.zh: 如果这两个女孩儿走了…

translation.en: ...I shall leave this house.
translation.zh: 我也会离开

translation.en: Oh, Miss Kenton.
translation.zh: 哦，基顿小姐

translation.en: Please.
translation.zh: 求你了

translation.en: These references, I have to tell you...
translation.zh: 你的推荐信，我不得不说…

translation.en: ...are quite reserved.
translation.zh: 很有保留

translation.en: Why did you leave your last employment?
translation.zh: 你为什么离开上一任主人？

translation.en: -They didn't want me anymore. -Why not?
translation.zh: -他们不要我了 -为什么？

translation.en: I don't know.
translation.zh: 我不知道

translation.en: They just didn't want me anymore.
translation.zh: 他们就是不要我了

translation.en: They say she works well.
translation.zh: 他们说她工作很努力

translation.en: Would you please wait outside?
translation.zh: 你能出去等吗？

translation.en: -She's unsuitable. -Not at all. I want her.
translation.zh: -她不合适 -不对，我想要她

translation.en: -She'll be under my supervision. -She's not suitable.
translation.zh: -她会在我手下工作 -她不合适

translation.en: She'll do well. I'll see to it.
translation.zh: 她会表现很好的 我来负责

translation.en: Well, then, it is entirely your responsibility.
translation.zh: 那就完全是你的责任了

translation.en: Weren't you leaving because of the German girls?
translation.zh: 你不是因为那两个德国女孩儿 要离开的吗？

translation.en: I'm not leaving.
translation.zh: 我不会离开的

translation.en: I've nowhere to go. I have no family.
translation.zh: 我没有哪儿可去 我没有家人

translation.en: I'm a coward.
translation.zh: 我是一个胆小鬼

translation.en: No, no.
translation.zh: 不，不

translation.en: Yes. I am a coward.
translation.zh: 就是，我是一个胆小鬼

translation.en: I'm frightened of leaving, and that's the truth.
translation.zh: 我害怕离开，是实话

translation.en: All I see out in the world is loneliness, and it frightens me.
translation.zh: 对我讲，外面的世界只有孤独，我很害怕

translation.en: That's all my high principles are worth.
translation.zh: 我所谓的清高准则就值那么些

translation.en: I'm ashamed of myself.
translation.zh: 我为自己感到羞愧

translation.en: Miss Kenton....
translation.zh: 基顿小姐…

translation.en: You mean a great deal to this house.
translation.zh: 你对这个家来说非常重要

translation.en: You're extremely important to this house, Miss Kenton.
translation.zh: 你非常重要，基顿小姐

translation.en: Am I?
translation.zh: 是吗？

translation.en: Yes.
translation.zh: 是的

translation.en: Yes.
translation.zh: 是的

translation.en: Now, look here...
translation.zh: 看看这儿…

translation.en: ...if you're really sure about her, you'd better call her back in.
translation.zh: 如果你确定要她，你最好叫她进来

translation.en: Miss Hull.
translation.zh: 赫尔小姐

translation.en: Miss Hull, we would like you to start next week.
translation.zh: 赫尔小姐 我们想让你下周开始工作

translation.en: You're responsible to Miss Kenton. She'll explain the house rules.
translation.zh: 基顿小姐是你的主管 她会跟你解释家里的规矩

translation.en: Number one: no gentlemen callers, or other such.
translation.zh: 第一条 不许有男人来拜访之类的

translation.en: -Yes, sir. -Good.
translation.zh: -是的，先生 -很好

translation.en: -Welcome. -Thank you, sir.
translation.zh: -欢迎你 -谢谢你，先生

translation.en: Well done. I'll show you to your room.
translation.zh: 很好，我带你四处参观一下

translation.en: Hello, excuse me.
translation.zh: 你好，不好意思

translation.en: I'd forgotten how much petrol the Daimler uses.
translation.zh: 我忘记了戴姆勒很耗油

translation.en: It's an impractical motor to be going about the country, Mister....
translation.zh: 我想开着它环游全国 不是很实际…

translation.en: Smith. Harry Smith. It's a privilege to have you here in Moscombe.
translation.zh: 我叫哈利·史密斯 很高兴在莫思考比见到你

translation.en: -It's a privilege to be here. -Your health, sir.
translation.zh: -我很高兴来到这里 -为了您的健康，先生

translation.en: Dr. Carlisle usually drops in around now. He'd enjoy meeting you.
translation.zh: 卡尔兰医生经常在这个时候光顾这里 他会很高兴见到你的

translation.en: He's a gentleman like yourself.
translation.zh: 他和你一样，是一位绅士

translation.en: I don't know what you call a gentleman.
translation.zh: 我不知道你所谓的绅士是什么意思

translation.en: It's a name every man in this country has a right to.
translation.zh: 这个国家每一个男人 都有权力称自己为绅士

translation.en: There's Harry Smith now, giving you an earful of his philosophy.
translation.zh: 哈利·史密斯要给你讲他的人生哲理

translation.en: We English...
translation.zh: 我们英国人…

translation.en: ...have the advantage and privilege of expressing our opinions...
translation.zh: 有权力表达自己的意见…

translation.en: ...and voting for Parliament. That's what we fought Hitler for.
translation.zh: 为议会投票 这是我们要对抗希特勒的原因

translation.en: Have you had much to do with politics yourself?
translation.zh: 你了解政治吗？

translation.en: Not directly as such, no, particularly in these days.
translation.zh: 不太了解，尤其是最近几年

translation.en: Perhaps more so in the early 1930s and just before the war.
translation.zh: 或许在三十年代早期的战前 我还有所了解

translation.en: My concern was more international affairs.
translation.zh: 我更关心国际局势

translation.en: Or foreign policy, so to speak.
translation.zh: 或者外交政策

translation.en: Not that I ever held high office, mind you.
translation.zh: 我要提醒你们 我并没有身居高位

translation.en: No, any influence I exerted was in an unofficial capacity.
translation.zh: 我的影响力仅限于非官方的

translation.en: Excuse me, sir.
translation.zh: 对不起，先生

translation.en: Have you ever met Mr. Churchill?
translation.zh: 你见过丘吉尔先生吗？

translation.en: He came to the house occasionally. Again, in the early 1930s.
translation.zh: 是的，他偶尔会来庄园 还是三十年代早期

translation.en: He was a bloody warmonger!
translation.zh: 他根本是个战争贩子！

translation.en: Honestly, Harry! We wouldn't have won the war without him.
translation.zh: 说实话，哈利，没有他 我们不可能打赢战争

translation.en: Not content to fight Germans, he sent troops in against the miners.
translation.zh: 他不满足于只对抗德国人 他对煤炭工人派了兵

translation.en: -What about the war? -Yes, all right.
translation.zh: -那战争呢？ -好吧

translation.en: He did well in the war, but he should've stepped down.
translation.zh: 他在战争中的表现是不错 但是他应该下台

translation.en: -And Mr. Eden? -He made a right bugger of Suez!
translation.zh: -伊登先生呢？ -他争取了苏伊士运河

translation.en: Yes, I met Mr. Eden. Yes, occasionally.
translation.zh: 是的，我见过伊登先生 几次而已

translation.en: How do you do? Richard Carlisle.
translation.zh: 你好吗？ 我是理查德·卡尔兰

translation.en: Rotten luck about your car, but nice to have you.
translation.zh: 你的车很不幸 但是很高兴你在这儿

translation.en: -Everyone has been most kind. -He says he knows foreign affairs.
translation.zh: -所有人都很友好 -他说他了解外交局势

translation.en: Is that so, indeed?
translation.zh: 是吗？

translation.en: In an unofficial capacity.
translation.zh: 非正式的小范围内

translation.en: -He knows Mr. Churchill. -And Mr. Eden.
translation.zh: -他认识丘吉尔先生 -还有伊登先生

translation.en: Really?
translation.zh: 真的吗？

translation.en: Yes, well, it was my good fortune to have consorted...
translation.zh: 是的，我很幸运能见过很多…

translation.en: ...with many men of influence from Europe and from America.
translation.zh: 有影响力的欧洲人和美国人

translation.en: Mr. Taylor...
translation.zh: 泰勒先生…

translation.en: ...I really feel I ought to retire now because I'm feeling rather tired.
translation.zh: 我想我得离开了 我很累

translation.en: No wonder, sir. Running out of petrol...
translation.zh: 不累才怪呢 汽车没油…

translation.en: ...then having to hear Smith's political opinions.
